typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	run_id as string (''),
	date as string ('2021-02-06')
}
source(output(
		eqp_sched_id as string,
		ac_registration as string,
		status_code as string,
		status_name as string,
		status_description as string,
		start_time as string,
		end_time as string,
		notes as string,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		updated_at as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> StgEquipSchd
FilterByDate split(isNull(ac_registration) || iif(isNull(end_time), false(), iif(isNull(start_time), false(), start_time>end_time)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Reject, FilteredData)
ConditionalSplit1@Reject derive(REJECT_REASON = "Data Validation Error",
		ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns
ConditionalSplit1@FilteredData derive(ADF_TIME_STMP = currentTimestamp(),
		ADF_RUN_ID = $run_id) ~> AddADFColumns2
StgEquipSchd filter(toDate(updated_at)  >= toDate($date) && toDate(updated_at) < currentDate()) ~> FilterByDate
AddADFColumns sink(input(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as timestamp,
		END_TIME as timestamp,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as timestamp,
		REJECT_REASON as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EQP_SCHED_ID = eqp_sched_id,
		AC_RGSTRN = ac_registration,
		STS_CD = status_code,
		STS_NAME = status_name,
		STS_DESC = status_description,
		STRT_TIME = start_time,
		END_TIME = end_time,
		NOTE = notes,
		IS_DELD = is_deleted,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at,
		REJECT_REASON,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EquipReject
AddADFColumns2 sink(input(
		EQP_SCHED_ID as integer,
		AC_RGSTRN as string,
		STS_CD as string,
		STS_NAME as string,
		STS_DESC as string,
		STRT_TIME as string,
		END_TIME as string,
		NOTE as string,
		IS_DELD as boolean,
		UPDTD_AT as string,
		ADF_TIME_STMP as timestamp,
		ADF_RUN_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EQP_SCHED_ID = eqp_sched_id,
		AC_RGSTRN = ac_registration,
		STS_CD = status_code,
		STS_NAME = status_name,
		STS_DESC = status_description,
		STRT_TIME = start_time,
		END_TIME = end_time,
		NOTE = notes,
		IS_DELD = is_deleted,
		UPDTD_AT = updated_at,
		ADF_TIME_STMP,
		ADF_RUN_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> EquipStg
